entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then periods of rain or snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain or periods of snow early in the evening. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
